rev.desc.rev.desc: Change ID Number shall not increased by "Withdraw" action
updated the exit.bg panel. Added a line to set $L.exit="bad.val":
if (nullsub(4 in $L.values, "nosave")="bad.val") then ($L.exit="bad.val")
fix issue with pashe pointer in auto open task
Devtx I1547
Updated the set.category.name panel
From:
if ($L.filename="cm3t") then ($L.category.name=nullsub(category in $L.file, default.task.category in $L.env))
To:
if ($L.filename="cm3t") then ($L.category.name=nullsub(category in $L.file, default.category in $L.env))
Panel get.object
Changed normal exit from get.env to check.auth
Panel get.env
deleted panel
Added get.script.category panel after call.precategory.script to get the category name out of the file variable passed to the script.

Changed the order of the panels, and added new panle check.if.task.
Old application flow: Path if filetype is cm3t: check.saved.parents -> set.parent.vars -> fill.from.parent -> complete.msg -> check.copy.open ->copy.fields/copy.model ->set.vars Path if filetype is cm3r: check.saved.parents ->check.copy.open -> copy.fields/copy.model ->set.vars
New Flow: Path if filetype is cm3r: check.saved.parents ->set.parent.vars -> check.copy.open -> copy.fields/copy.model -> check if task -> set.vars Path if filetype is cm3t: check.saved.parents ->set.parent.vars -> check.copy.open -> copy.fields/copy.model -> check if task -> fill.from.parent ->complete.message -> set.vars
Added processing to check for operator profile authorization BEFORE the open script is executed.
panel: call.precategory.script
changed the error exit...
from: select.category
to: no.open.msg
Added two parameters for screlation processing (changes only): related filename and related ID; changed call.save.process to pass in $L.related.id and $L.related.filename.
On check.master.fc, changed exit condition from name in $L.fc.master~=name in $L.fc to not same(name in $L.fc.master, name in $L.fc).
No longer sets close.time to NULL on set.vars. It is now set on cm.open.save:update.current.
No longer sets date.entered and orig.date.entered to tod() on set.vars. Instead they are set in trigger.cm3r.pre.edit and trigger.cm3t.pre.edit.
Can now copy and open changes with tasks: modified call.save.process to pass in $L.copy.number which is set to number in $L.file.save if $L.copy is true and $L.filename="cm3r".
Now calls get.base.form.name to set up the format control name. The master.fc field in the object record is referenced instead of the filename to select the master format control record.
Star Team: Initializes the parent variable even if $L.parent.name is null.
Star Team: Now returns to the category QBE after failing to select a task with a parent change candidate.
Nullsubbed assign.number to false.

descript.descript: Change ID Number shall not increased by "Withdraw" action
updated the exit.bg panel. Added a line to set $L.exit="bad.val":
if (nullsub(4 in $L.values, "nosave")="bad.val") then ($L.exit="bad.val")
fix issue with pashe pointer in auto open task
Devtx I1547
Updated the set.category.name panel
From:
if ($L.filename="cm3t") then ($L.category.name=nullsub(category in $L.file, default.task.category in $L.env))
To:
if ($L.filename="cm3t") then ($L.category.name=nullsub(category in $L.file, default.category in $L.env))
Panel get.object
Changed normal exit from get.env to check.auth
Panel get.env
deleted panel
Added get.script.category panel after call.precategory.script to get the category name out of the file variable passed to the script.

Changed the order of the panels, and added new panle check.if.task.
Old application flow: Path if filetype is cm3t: check.saved.parents -> set.parent.vars -> fill.from.parent -> complete.msg -> check.copy.open ->copy.fields/copy.model ->set.vars Path if filetype is cm3r: check.saved.parents ->check.copy.open -> copy.fields/copy.model ->set.vars
New Flow: Path if filetype is cm3r: check.saved.parents ->set.parent.vars -> check.copy.open -> copy.fields/copy.model -> check if task -> set.vars Path if filetype is cm3t: check.saved.parents ->set.parent.vars -> check.copy.open -> copy.fields/copy.model -> check if task -> fill.from.parent ->complete.message -> set.vars
Added processing to check for operator profile authorization BEFORE the open script is executed.
panel: call.precategory.script
changed the error exit...
from: select.category
to: no.open.msg
Added two parameters for screlation processing (changes only): related filename and related ID; changed call.save.process to pass in $L.related.id and $L.related.filename.
On check.master.fc, changed exit condition from name in $L.fc.master~=name in $L.fc to not same(name in $L.fc.master, name in $L.fc).
No longer sets close.time to NULL on set.vars. It is now set on cm.open.save:update.current.
No longer sets date.entered and orig.date.entered to tod() on set.vars. Instead they are set in trigger.cm3r.pre.edit and trigger.cm3t.pre.edit.
Can now copy and open changes with tasks: modified call.save.process to pass in $L.copy.number which is set to number in $L.file.save if $L.copy is true and $L.filename="cm3r".

Cleaned up paging. page and total.pages are no longer preset to 1 for new records. These fields are set in cm.open.save. The way it worked before, if paging wasn't enabled for the initial phase, the first page that got created was page 2.
Now calls get.base.form.name to set up the format control name. The master.fc field in the object record is referenced instead of the filename to select the master format control record.
Star Team: Initializes the parent variable even if $L.parent.name is null.l
Star Team: Now returns to the category QBE after failing to select a task with a parent change candidate.
Nullsub'd assign.number to false.
